page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox navigate method

argument.name: direction
argument.description: The direction to navigate. The value can be "first", "prev", "next" or "last".

argument.name: executeSelect
argument.description: Whether or not to execute the select events. The change event will always be executed when the value changes.

page.description: Navigate the view boxes selected value relative to the current active selection (see selectionInfo in *[link:A5.ViewBox]*).
